unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.steering

Interface SteeringOperation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseSteeringOperation, SteeringOperationChokePoints, SteeringOperationEnemiesInConfidenceRange, SteeringOperationSpecificUnit, SteeringOperationStartingLocation, SteeringOperationStrongestPlayerArea

    public interface SteeringOperation
    SteeringOperation.java --- Interface for all SteeringOperations the Unit can use to change various Vectors.
    Author:
    P H - 30.06.2017

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applySteeringForce(Vector targetVector, java.lang.Double intensity)
      Function for applying the steering force to a given Vector.

    • Method Detail

      • applySteeringForce

        void applySteeringForce(Vector targetVector,
                        java.lang.Double intensity)
        Function for applying the steering force to a given Vector.
        Parameters:
        targetVector - the Vector to which the steering force will be applied.
        intensity - the intensity with which the steering force will be applied. Greater values will have a higher impact on the Vector overall.
